itv_asset_tree.utils.duplicate_resolution module¶

class itv_asset_tree.utils.duplicate_resolution.DuplicateResolver(strategy: DuplicateStrategy)[source]¶

Bases: object

Resolves duplicates within a dataset based on user-selected strategies.

resolve_group(group, group_name, key_column)[source]¶

Resolves duplicates within a single group of data.

Parameters:

  • group (pd.DataFrame) – The group of data containing potential duplicates.

  • group_name (str) – The name of the group being processed.

  • key_column (str) – The column used to determine duplicates.

Returns:

A DataFrame with resolved duplicates.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

class itv_asset_tree.utils.duplicate_resolution.DuplicateStrategy[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for duplicate resolution strategies.

Subclasses must implement the resolve method to specify how duplicates should be handled.

resolve(group, key_column)[source]¶

Resolves duplicates within a given group.

Parameters:

  • group (pd.DataFrame) – The group of data containing potential duplicates.

  • key_column (str) – The column used to determine duplicates.

Returns:

A DataFrame with duplicates resolved according to the strategy.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

class itv_asset_tree.utils.duplicate_resolution.KeepFirstStrategy[source]¶

Bases: DuplicateStrategy

Strategy that keeps the first occurrence of each duplicate and removes the rest.

itv_asset_tree.utils.lookup_builder module¶

class itv_asset_tree.utils.lookup_builder.LookupTableBuilder(group_column, key_column, value_column)[source]¶

Bases: object

Builds lookup tables from cleaned data.

This class is responsible for creating lookup tables from a DataFrame and saving them in a structured CSV format for later use.

build(data)[source]¶

Builds lookup tables as a dictionary from a given DataFrame.

Parameters:

data (DataFrame) – The DataFrame containing the data.

Returns:

A dictionary where keys are group names and values are lookup tables.

Return type:

dict

static save_lookup_to_csv(lookup_data, parent_paths, output_file)[source]¶

Saves lookup table data to a CSV file in the required format.

Parameters:

  • lookup_data (dict) – Lookup table dictionary where keys are group names.

  • parent_paths (dict) – Dictionary mapping group names to Parent Paths.

  • output_file (str) – Path to save the output CSV file.

Loads metadata from a file using pickle deserialization.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – The path to the metadata file to be loaded.

Returns:

The deserialized metadata object.

any

itv_asset_tree.utils.metadata_handler.save_metadata(metadata, file_path)[source]¶

Saves metadata to a file using pickle serialization.

Parameters:

  • metadata (any) – The metadata object to be saved.

  • file_path (str) – The path where the metadata file will be stored.
